Based on type, folder and file you can select one single update here.

Not all update counters could be verified while reworking update data. Please check the following for every counter name in the list. Refresh this page afterwards.
- is the package whose name can be derived from the counter name installed? If no, please remove the corresponding counter name manually from the table cms_config_parameter.
- is the package a bundle? If no, please add the bundle class and register the bundle in the AppKernel.
- is the bundle registered in the AppKernel? If no, please do this.

Lock record if list is empty
If checked, an empty list actually means that the restriction is never satisfied - so the record is effectively disabled. If not checked, an empty list means "no restriction".
